mapper.insert: insert into faq (faq_title, faq_content, faq_category_id, faq_create_by, faq_update_by) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{category.id}, #{createByUser.id}, #{updateByUser.id})
mapper.select: select f.faq_id as id, f.faq_title as title, f.faq_content as content, f.faq_create_date as createDate, f.faq_update_date as updateDate, f.faq_delete_date as deleteDate, f.faq_delete_yn as deleteYn, f.faq_category_id as "category.id", c.faq_category_name as "category.name", f.faq_create_by as "createByUser.id", f.faq_update_by as "updateByUser.id" from faq f left join faq_category c ON f.faq_category_id = c.faq_category_id where faq_id = #{id} and faq_delete_yn = 'N' order by faq_id desc
select faq_category_id as id, faq_category_name as name from faq_category order by faq_category_id asc
select faq_category_id as id, faq_category_name as name from faq_category where faq_category_id = #{id}
